complaint.description: I have been trying to get through to an actual person at customer care. I am having a problem with a sms I received with a supposed "customer services" I subscribed to, which I did NOT. I would like to make it abundantly clear that I am not prepared to pay for any "services" that I certainly did not subscribe to.

meta.review_title: Vodacom, I don't want your bl**dy robot Toby, I want to talk to a actual person who can help.
meta.review_content:
Vodacom what the h*ll type of game are you playing.
I have been trying to get through to an actual person at customer care.
I am having a problem with a sms I received with a supposed " customer services" I subscribed to, which I did NOT.
I would like to make it abundantly clear that I am not prepared to pay for any "services" that I certainly did not subscribe to.
